attributes.action: residents and freinds of long lane bolton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there seems to be a lack of consultation with the communities that major plans are happening and request that there should be a change to the law and make it that the entire community should know and not just those opposite where the build is to go there is a wider community

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
